title: Flash Tank Material Balance (Binary Mixture)
statement:
A binary mixture of components A and B enters a flash tank at 150 mol/min. The feed contains 45 mol% A and 55 mol% B. The vapor stream leaving the flash tank contains 65 mol% A, while the liquid stream contains 25 mol% A. Assume steady state and no chemical reactions.

(a) Set up the overall and component A balances.
(b) Calculate the vapor and liquid flow rates.

parts.prompt: Solve for the vapor flow rate, V.
Solve for the liquid flow rate, L.

notes: No phase equilibrium relations are needed. Use steady-state overall and component A balances.

learning_objectives: Apply steady-state overall and component material balances to a two-outlet unit.
Distinguish feed composition (z) from phase compositions (x, y).
Solve a 2x2 linear system for V and L using balances.

common_mistakes.symptom: Uses z_A in outlet streams or swaps x_A and y_A.
common_mistakes.coach_message: Double-check what z, x, and y represent: z is feed composition, y is vapor composition, x is liquid composition.

common_mistakes.symptom: Writes only one balance equation (not enough to solve).
common_mistakes.coach_message: You need two independent equations to solve for two unknowns (V and L). Use an overall balance and a component balance.
Convert mol% to a fraction before using it in balances (e.g., 45% â†’ 0.45).

common_mistakes.symptom: Uses F = L - V or mismatched inlet/outlet signs.
common_mistakes.coach_message: At steady state: In = Out. Make sure all outlet flow rates appear with a positive sign on the outlet side.

hint_ladder.hint: Start with an overall molar balance on the flash tank (no accumulation).
Write a component A balance using the given compositions for the feed, vapor, and liquid.
You now have two linear equations in V and L. Solve the system and check that V + L equals the feed flow rate.

what_to_look_for_in_student_work: A clearly stated overall balance (F = V + L).
A component A balance using z_A, y_A, x_A correctly.
Algebra steps solving the two-equation system.
work_upload_expectations.if_pdf_unreadable_prompt: Please type the two balance equations you used and any intermediate values you calculated for V and L.
